item.title: This Site Is Not Written By AI
item.description: It may be slop, but it’s slop made by ME.

item.title: New email/website domain!

item.title: New light theme on daylight savings plus I hate daylight savings
item.description: I added a light theme so it’s easier for some users to read. Also I hate daylight savings.
